first_para: Angela "Angie" Lavinia Bray (born 13 October 1953) is a British Conservative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ealing Central and Acton since 2010.

full.extract: Angela "Angie" Lavinia Bray (born 13 October 1953) is a British Conservative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ealing Central and Acton since 2010.
full.title: Angie Bray
